languages.text: "Верно. Что же, вы убедили меня... пока что. Однако я умоляю вас обратиться ко мне, если захотите освежить ваши знания. До свидания, Лорд-капитан".

"You are correct. Well, Lord Captain, you have convinced me... However, I would implore you to seek my assistance should you ever wish to refresh your memory. If you will permit me, I will return to my post, Lord Captain."
languages.original_text: "Верно. Что же, вы убедили меня... пока что. Однако я умоляю вас обратиться ко мне, если захотите освежить ваши знания. До свидания, Лорд-капитан".

traits.locale_text: "That is correct. Well, Lord Captain, you have convinced me... for the moment. However, I would implore you to seek my assistance should you ever wish to refresh your memory. If I may return to my post, Lord Captain."
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

traits.locale_text: "That is correct. Well, Lord Captain, you have convinced me... for the moment. However, I would implore you to seek my assistance should you ever wish to refresh your memory. If I may return to my post, Lord Captain."

traits.locale_text: "You are correct. Well, Lord Captain, you have convinced me... However, I would implore you to seek my assistance should you ever wish to refresh your memory. If you will permit me, I will return to my post, Lord Captain."

languages.text: « C'est exact. Très bien, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine}, vous m'avez convaincu... mais je vous prie de faire appel à moi si vous souhaitez vous rafraîchir la mémoire. Sur ce, si vous me le permettez, je vais retourner à mon poste. »
languages.original_text: "You are correct. Well, Lord Captain, you have convinced me... However, I would implore you to seek my assistance should you ever wish to refresh your memory. If you will permit me, I will return to my post, Lord Captain."

traits.locale_text: « C'est exact. Très bien, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine}, vous m'avez convaincu... mais je vous prie de faire appel à moi si vous souhaitez vous rafraîchir la mémoire. Sur ce, si vous me le permettez, je vais retourner à mon poste. »
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: «Así es. Bueno, Lord Capitán, me ha convencido... Aun así, le imploro que solicite mi asistencia si desea refrescar su memoria en algún momento. Si me lo permite, volveré a mi puesto, Lord Capitán».
languages.original_text: "You are correct. Well, Lord Captain, you have convinced me... However, I would implore you to seek my assistance should you ever wish to refresh your memory. If you will permit me, I will return to my post, Lord Captain."

traits.locale_text: «Así es. Bueno, Lord Capitán, me ha convencido... Aun así, le imploro que solicite mi asistencia si desea refrescar su memoria en algún momento. Si me lo permite, volveré a mi puesto, Lord Capitán».
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: “您说得没错。好吧，舰长大人，您已经说服了我……不过，如果您打算重温一下王朝历史的话，我恳请您务必寻求我的帮助。如果您允许的话，我准备回到岗位上了，舰长大人。”
languages.original_text: "You are correct. Well, Lord Captain, you have convinced me... However, I would implore you to seek my assistance should you ever wish to refresh your memory. If you will permit me, I will return to my post, Lord Captain."

traits.locale_text: “您说得没错。好吧，舰长大人，您已经说服了我……不过，如果您打算重温一下王朝历史的话，我恳请您务必寻求我的帮助。如果您允许的话，我准备回到岗位上了，舰长大人。”
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: 「あなたは正しいです。ロード・キャプテン、あなたに説得されました…。しかし、記憶を取り戻したくなったら、私の助けを求めてください。もしよろしければ、私は持ち場に戻ります、ロード・キャプテン」
languages.original_text: "You are correct. Well, Lord Captain, you have convinced me... However, I would implore you to seek my assistance should you ever wish to refresh your memory. If you will permit me, I will return to my post, Lord Captain."

traits.locale_text: 「あなたは正しいです。ロード・キャプテン、あなたに説得されました…。しかし、記憶を取り戻したくなったら、私の助けを求めてください。もしよろしければ、私は持ち場に戻ります、ロード・キャプテン」
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: "Ihr habt recht. Nun, Lord Captain, Ihr habt mich überzeugt ... Ich bitte Euch jedoch inständig, mich um Hilfe zu bitten, solltet Ihr Euer Gedächtnis jemals auffrischen wollen. Wenn Ihr es mir gestattet, kehre ich nun auf meinen Posten zurück, Lord Captain."
languages.original_text: "You are correct. Well, Lord Captain, you have convinced me... However, I would implore you to seek my assistance should you ever wish to refresh your memory. If you will permit me, I will return to my post, Lord Captain."

traits.locale_text: "Ihr habt recht. Nun, Lord Captain, Ihr habt mich überzeugt ... Ich bitte Euch jedoch inständig, mich um Hilfe zu bitten, solltet Ihr Euer Gedächtnis jemals auffrischen wollen. Wenn Ihr es mir gestattet, kehre ich nun auf meinen Posten zurück, Lord Captain."
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: "Haklısınız. Beni ikna ettiniz Lord Kaptan. Ancak hafızanızı tazelemek isterseniz yardımımı istemeniz konusunda ısrar edeceğim. İzin verirseniz mevkime döneceğim Lord Kaptan."
languages.original_text: "You are correct. Well, Lord Captain, you have convinced me... However, I would implore you to seek my assistance should you ever wish to refresh your memory. If you will permit me, I will return to my post, Lord Captain."
